00051 #include <time.h>
00052 #include <pthread.h>
00053 #include <string.h>

00056 #include "log.h"
00057 #include "HashData.h"
00058 #include "HashTable.h"
00059 #include "fsal.h"
00060 #include "cache_inode.h"
00061 #include "cache_inode_lru.h"
00062 #include "cache_inode_weakref.h"
00063 #include "nfs4_acls.h"
00064 #include "sal_functions.h"
00065 
00081 void
00082 cache_inode_kill_entry(cache_entry_t *entry)
00083 {
00084      cache_inode_fsal_data_t fsaldata;
00085      hash_buffer_t key;
00086      hash_buffer_t val;
00087      int rc = 0;
00088 
00089      memset(&fsaldata, 0, sizeof(fsaldata));
00090 
00091      LogInfo(COMPONENT_CACHE_INODE,
00092              "Using cache_inode_kill_entry for entry %p", entry);
00093 
00094      cache_inode_unpinnable(entry);
00095      state_wipe_file(entry);
00096 
00097      fsaldata.fh_desc = entry->fh_desc;
00098      FSAL_ExpandHandle(NULL,
00099                        FSAL_DIGEST_SIZEOF,
00100                        &fsaldata.fh_desc);
00101 
00102      /* Use the handle to build the key */
00103      key.pdata = fsaldata.fh_desc.start;
00104      key.len = fsaldata.fh_desc.len;
00105 
00106      val.pdata = entry;
00107      val.len = sizeof(cache_entry_t);
00108 
00109      if ((rc = HashTable_DelSafe(fh_to_cache_entry_ht,
00110                                  &key,
00111                                  &val)) != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS) {
00112           if (rc != HASHTABLE_ERROR_NO_SUCH_KEY) {
00113                LogCrit(COMPONENT_CACHE_INODE,
00114                        "cache_inode_kill_entry: entry could not be deleted, "
00115                        " status = %d",
00116                        rc);
00117           }
00118      }
00119 
00120      cache_inode_weakref_delete(&entry->weakref);
00121 
00122      /* Idempotently return the sentry reference.  (This function
00123         will only decrement the refcount once, no matter how many
00124         times it's called. */
00125      cache_inode_lru_kill(entry);
00126 } /* cache_inode_kill_entry */
